name: Illusion (itch) (TheLiverMan)
description:
Chase the girl of your dreams from and through cleverly placed traps in the environment. Utilize your special ability to see underneath the world to detect traps that will kill you!

Credits:

TheLiverMan - Coder
Relish - Artist
ActualGodYeebus - UI Artist & Soundtrack Artist

[Developer Notes]
The majority of this project was done over the span of around 4 days, with school actively interfering in progress. Bugs are to be expected, and will be patched soon.I would highly recommend downloading a build, as all of the UI will automatically scale correctly.
